dateList.description: Born in Thanh Hoa city in Viet Nam. July 31st is the birthday of Harry Potter as well. I'm a Tiger, at the same time a Leo, which constitutes my stubbornness and confidence

dateList.content: My parents got our first house built
dateList.description: After all the sweat. Almost all furniture in our house was handmade by my dad (he's a mechanical engineer)

dateList.content: Started at Dien Bien 1 elementary school

dateList.description: While playing tag game with my friends. Mom was in another city for studying but had to cancel to go home for me. I never want sacrifice to be an option

dateList.description: For gifted students in English. Decided to drop out next year to study math

From his own money. For a basic family like us, it's something we always dreamt of

About love, marriage and things. Realized she was really open. We just did not have a chance to talk all these years and our emotions got buried

dateList.content: First time Dad confided to me
dateList.description: About why he locked the door, about his conflict with mom and this family. I had to listen to him and Mom, at the same time stopped my brother from making things worse. I did not know what to do. I just cried.

dateList.content: Smoke a cig and close my eyes
